name: AI Engineer
objective: Identify posts that indicate a need to hire a developer/engineer who builds custom AI/ML systems or models.
qualifier: Classify posts whose title or description implies hiring or seeking AI/ML engineering work.

heuristics: Title contains at least one 'must' keyword and a hiring verb (e.g., 'hire', 'looking for', 'need').
If only 'should' keywords appear without hiring verbs, prefer 'review' rather than 'prospect'.
If explicit product-for-sale language is present, mark 'rejected'.
positive_examples: Hiring: Senior ML Engineer to build custom LLM integrations
Looking for AI developer to fine-tune models for medical text
negative_examples: Free AI tutorial resources — anyone want to share?
Looking to buy an AI course (not hiring)
ambiguous_examples: Need help with model deployment — budget TBD
Looking for someone to consult on ML strategy (may be hiring or consulting)

labels.label: prospect
labels.description: Likely a hiring need for an AI engineer. Prioritize contact.

labels.label: review
labels.description: Uncertain — requires human review to confirm.

classifierHints.replyFormat: Return a JSON array with objects matching outputSchema. Keep evidence one short sentence indicating the deciding factor.
